thing-type.description: MK Honeywell Astral 2 Load Wall Dimmer - LDM32UC<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<h1&gtLDM32UC</h1&gt <p&gt<strong&gt2 GANG 300W DIMMER MODULE</strong&gt</p&gt <p&gtRF Range up to 75m (open field)<br /&gtCan control up to 5 devices<br /&gtCan control either a group or a scene<br /&gtPre programmed with HOLIDAY MODE function<br /&gtMains powered<br /&gt<br /&gtSTANDARD CARTON QUANTITY: 1</p&gt <p&gtSuitable for use with the following load types and maximum load ratings only.</p&gt <table&gt<tr&gt<td&gtLoad Type </td&gt <td&gt2G 300W Dimmer</td&gt </tr&gt<tr&gt<td&gtGLS </td&gt <td&gt25-300W per channel</td&gt </tr&gt<tr&gt<td&gtTungsten filament </td&gt <td&gt25-300W per channel</td&gt </tr&gt<tr&gt<td&gtTungsten halogen </td&gt <td&gt25-300W per channel</td&gt </tr&gt<tr&gt<td&gt12V ELV Tungsten halogen with wirewound or electronic transformers</td&gt <td&gt35-300W per channel</td&gt </tr&gt</table&gt<p&gt <br /&gtNot suitable with any other load type. Do not use different types of lamps on the same load current.<br /&gt<br /&gtBS EN 60669-2-1<br /&gtBS EN 61000-6-1 / 3<br /&gtETSI EN 301489-1 / 2<br /&gtETSI EN 300220-1/ 2</p&gt <p&gtMounting Boxes: Flush 35mm<br /&gt<br /&gtOperating Frequency 868.4 MHz<br /&gt<br /&gtSelect the appropriate 2 Gang Dimmer Fascia for your Dimmer Module</p&gt <p&gtFull Data Sheet is available from here: View Full Data Sheet</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTo include device into another system press any operation button </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTo exclude device from a system quickly press Dis/Exc button twice in 1s </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtSUC/SIS updates:</p&gt <p&gtPeriodic and routine update will be requested every:</p&gt <p&gt 24 operations on 1 Gang Products</p&gt <p&gt 36 operations on 2 Gang Products</p&gt <p&gt To initiate a manual wake-up and update request press Exc/Dis</p&gt <p&gtNote: Only available if SUC/SIS in network. </p&gt
